def modify_bytearray(b_array, value, index):
    """Modify a bytearray at a specific index with a new value."""
    b_array[index] = value

def main():
    # Create a bytearray from a list of integers
    numbers = [10, 20, 30, 40, 50]
    b_array = bytearray(numbers)
    
    # Modify the bytearray
    modify_bytearray(b_array, 99, 2)  # Modify the third element (index 2) with the value 99
    
    # Print the modified bytearray
    for byte in b_array:
        print(byte)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
